filename: 三年级下册英语清华版电子课本.pdf

chunks.content: 主 编： 范文芳 副主编： 宗 燕 Faridah Pawan (一年级起点) 下册 三 年 级 责任编辑： 宗 燕 责任校对： 李 梅 责任印制： 出版发行： 清华大学出版社 网 址： http://www.tup.com.cn ， http://www.wqbook.com 地 址： 北京清华大学学研大厦A座 邮 编 ： 100084 社 总 机： 010-62770175 邮 购 ： 010-62786544 投稿与读者服务： 010-62776969, c-service@tup.tsinghua.edu.cn 质 量 反 馈： 010-62772015, zhiliang@tup.tsinghua.edu.cn 课 件 下 载： http://www.wqbook.com/qhytl/ 印 装 者： 经 销： 全国新华书店 开 本： 185mm × 260mm 印 张： 5 版 次： 2014年8月第1版 印 次： 2019年8月第1次印刷 定 价： 5.00元 产品编号 ： 040303-01 本书封面贴有清华大学出版社防伪标签，无标签者不得销售。 版权所有，侵权必究。侵权举报电话：010-62782989 13701121933 图书在版编目（CIP）数据 英语. 三年级. 下册 / 范文芳主编. － 北京 : 清华大学出版社, 2014 一年级起点 ISBN 978-7-302-35472-7 I. ①英 ... II. ①范 ... III. ①英语课 － 小学 － 教材IV. ①G624.311 中国版本图书馆CIP数据核字(2014)第022982号 同学们 ， 欢迎你们使用由清华大学大 、 中 、 小学一条龙英语教学研究 与实践项目组编写的 《 英语 》 课本 ！ 我们为什么要学习英语呢 ？ 你们肯定知道 ， 这是因为英语很重要 。 英语像汉语一样 ， 能够描述丰富多 彩的世界 ， 表达各种各样的思想 。 通过英语 ， 我们可以更多地了解奇妙的世界 ， 了解世界上更多的人 ， 同时也可以把中国介绍给世界上更多的人 ， 让世界上更多 的人了解我们的祖国 ， 了解我们自己 。 在 世纪全球化的国际舞台上 ， 英语已经成为国际交流中的一种重要工 具 ， 因此 ， 我们都要学好英语 。 但是 ， 学好一门语言却不是一朝一夕的事情 ， 而 是需要多年的努力 。 你们年纪小 ， 模仿力强 ， 记忆力好 ， 正是学习英语的最佳时 期 。 希望你们努力学好英语 ， 为长大成材打下基础 。 我们要学习英语还有另外一个原因 ， 那就是英语非常有趣 ！ 英语可以像积 木 、 玩具汽车 、 布娃娃 、 拼图 、 动画片一样 ， 给我们带来无穷的乐趣 ！ 翻开清华大学大 、 中 、 小学一条龙英语教学研究与实践项目组为你们 编写的这套 《 英语 》 课本 ， 你们肯定会被那令人赏心悦目的图画所吸引 ； 听听课 文录音 ， 你们也一定会喜欢那纯正的英语和优美的歌曲 。 ——致同学 同学们 ， 欢迎你们使用由清华大学 “ 大 、 中 、 小学一条龙英语教学 ” 研究 与实践项目组编写的 《 英语 》 课本 ！ 我们为什么要学习英语呢 ？ 你们肯定知道 ， 这是因为英语很重要 。 英语像汉语一样 ， 能够描述丰富多 彩的世界 ， 表达各种各样的思想 。 通过英语 ， 我们可以更多地了解奇妙的世界 ， 了解世界上更多的人 ， 同时也可以把中国介绍给世界上更多的人 ， 让世界上更多 的人了解我们的祖国 ， 了解我们自己 。 在21世纪全球化的国际舞台上 ， 英语已经成为国际交流中的一种重要工 具 ， 因此 ， 我们都要学好英语 。 但是 ， 学好一门语言却不是一朝一夕的事情 ， 而 是需要多年的努力 。 你们年纪小 ， 模仿力强 ， 记忆力好 ， 正是学习英语的最佳时 期 。 希望你们努力学好英语 ， 为长大成材打下基础 。 我们要学习英语还有另外一个原因 ， 那就是英语非常有趣 ！ 英语可以像积 木 、 玩具汽车 、 布娃娃 、 拼图 、 动画片一样 ， 给我们带来无穷的乐趣 ！ 翻开清华大学 “ 大 、 中 、 小学一条龙英语教学 ” 研究与实践项目组为你们 编写的这套 《 英语 》 课本 ， 你们肯定会被那令人赏心悦目的图画所吸引 ； 听听课 文录音 ， 你们也一定会喜欢那纯正的英语和优美的歌曲 。 这套教材以你们感兴趣的话题为中心 ， 选取的是与你们日常生活息息相关 的内容 。 教材中安排了你们喜欢的动物 、 食物以及你们喜欢的活动如游泳 、 踢 足球等 ， 还有许多生动有趣的故事 ， 相信你们会喜欢这套教材 。 在老师的指导 下 ， 在听 、 说 、 唱 、 动 、 读 、 写中学会用英语说自己想说的话 ， 写出自己的 心声

chunks.content: 。 英语很重要 ！ 英语很有趣 ！ 让我们共同努力 ， 把英语学好

I share my toys and my books, With my friends. toys my friends umbrella Li Ping bananas the bear I share my toys with my friends. ______________ ______________ ______________ ______________ 13 UNIT 1 (1) I’m a _________ (student, teacher). (5) I like my _________ (English, drawing) class. (6) My mother has _________ (black, long) hair. (7) I have an orange. Do you want to _________ (eat, share) it with me? (8) Look at the cat. The more we get together, The happier we’ll be. I have a lot of toys and books. Tom wants to play with my toy _______. I say, “No.” Tom picks up my toy _______. I say, “No.” “Can I read your _______, please?” Tom asks me. “No,” I say. Tom is _______. My mom says, “Please share your toys and books with Tom.” I give Tom my toys and books. Tom is _______ now. It’s nice to share our toys and books with our friends. planecarstorybookssadhappy 15 1616 Dry and wet; early and late. Light and dark; strong and weak. They are all fun opposites. Let’s learn them! My clothes, my clothes are very wet. Put on these clothes. They are dry. Put on these clothes. They are dry. 21 UNIT 2 2. Work in pairs. Can I put the apples in this basket? No, you can’t. It’s full. OK. Thank you. Put the apples in that basket. It’s empty. 1. Listen, look and say. basket full empty 22 4. Let’s sing! 3. Draw a line to connect the sentences that have opposites. The mouse is big. The boy is weak. The glass is empty. The giraffe is short. The elephant is strong. 25 UNIT 2 2. Work in pairs. Look, there are so many fish in this pond. There are no fish in this pond. Why, Mom? Because this pond is dirty. Fish cannot live in dirty water. 1. There’re no fish in that pond, in that pond. 27 UNIT 2 2. Work in groups. Am I late, Ms Li? No, you aren’t. It’s still early. Our class begins at 8 o’clock. I’m sorry I’m late. 1. Listen, look and say. early Class begins. late light dark dry wet clean dirty That’s OK. Don’t be late again. 28 (2) My mother comes home early. If I say clean, you say dirty. If I say full, you say empty. If I say late, you say early. If I say sad, you say happy. Opposites, opposites. I know many opposites. 3. Talk about it. Chinese New Yearhousedumpling Cheers! On Chinese New Year’s Eve, the family has a big dinner together. We eat dumplings and f ish. 1. Listen, look and say. We decorate our house.We say “Happy New Year!” Cheers! 44 4. Look at the picture. Finish the sentence. (1) Our national __________ is red with f ive yellow stars. (2) Children wear new __________ at the Chinese New Year. (3) We decorate our __________ for the Chinese New Year. (4) We eat __________ and f ish on Chinese New Year’s Eve. 5. Let’s say it! Five people sit at the table. Five people eat vegetables. Five people eat dumplings, One dumpling, two dumplings. 3. Listen and number. housedumplingflagclothes 45 UNIT 3 1. Read, look and match. 2. Write a sentence on each card. Children’s Day Christmas Chinese New Year’s Day Teacher’s Day our National Day Mother’s Day 46 3. Listen to the dialogue. Fill in the missing word. 4. Listen to the text. Then write the correct words or phrases under each picture. Christmas Day is on December 25. At Christmas, we see Christmas trees and Santa Claus. We sing Christmas songs. We give Christmas cards to our friends. We get Christmas gifts. We say “Merry Christmas!” to each other at Christmas. (3) Tom: What do you do for Chinese New Year? Lily: We decorate our _________. (1) Jane: What do you do on Teacher’s Day? John: We give teachers _________. (2) Lily: What do you do on your National Day? Tod: We go to Tian’anmen _________. 47 UNIT 4 I do my homework. I read storybooks. I play with my friends. I help Mom with housework. I have a great life. Do you? 48 UNIT4 WHAT ARE YOU DOING? 49 UNIT 4 1. Listen, look and say. My mother is cooking dinner. My father is reading newspapers. 2. Work in pairs. What are you doing , Cathy? I’m doing my homework , Mom. I’m doing my homework. Can you help me in the kitchen? Sure

Can you help me in the kitchen? Sure. 50 3. Draw a line to match the words. Then read them. sleeping snowing cooking doing dancing reading do cook read sleep snow dance The girl is sleeping. My uncle is cooking. The boy is reading.I’m doing my homework. 5. Let’s say it! Mother is cooking. Father is reading. Father is reading here. Father is reading there. 4. Look and read. Draw or . 51 UNIT 4 Peter is playing on the seesaw. John is playing on the swing. 2. Work in pairs. What are you doing, Cathy? Do you want to play with me? I’m sorry. I’m reading my storybook. I’m reading my storybook. 1. Listen, look and say. 52 I am a happy ________. I ride a ________ to school in the morning. I like to read ________. I like to play on the ________. I like to play on the________, too. What do you like to do? 3. Use the words under the pictures to finish the story. girl boybikebus 4. Let’s say it! Peter is playing on the seesaw. Peter is playing on the swing. Peter is playing here. Peter is playing there. slidestorybooksswingseesaw 53 UNIT 4 2. Work in pairs. Sally, let’s go jump rope. I’m sorry. I want to kick the shuttlecock. Cathy is kicking the shuttlecock. The girls are jumping rope. 1. Listen, look and say. 54 4. Finish the sentence with is or are. (1) The boy _______ jumping rope. (3) Look, John _______ making a paper plane. (2) The children _______ kicking the shuttlecock. 3. Draw a line to connect the words. Then read the pairs. jumping going singing making kicking dancing sing jump kick go dance make 5. Let’s say it! The girls are kicking the shuttlecock. The girls are jumping rope. The girls are jumping rope here

The boys are playing with yo-yos there. (1) Read the word. Write it on the line. (2) Finish the sentence with We or They. ______ are playing with our toys. ______ are playing with yo-yos. ______ are playing football. they we 57 UNIT 4 This is our classroom. We clean our classroom every day. I’m cleaning the floor. I’m cleaning the blackboard. We’re cleaning the desks. 1. Work in groups. floor desk 58 2. chunks.content: . That’s OK. Let’s go. I’m sorry I’m late. 1. Listen, look and say. 60 Two girls are waiting. Two girls are running. Two girls are running fast. Two girls are running slow. 4. Let’s say it! 3. About he and she. (1) Read the word. Write it on the line. (2) Finish the sentence with He or She. ______ is playing with a yo-yo. ______ is kicking the shuttlecock. ______ is swimming. heshe 61 UNIT 4 1. Write a sentence to tell about each picture. The first one is done for you. (3) the girl, cleaning _________________________________ (2) the man, watching _________________________________ (1) the girl, doing The girl is doing her homework. (4) Mike, cleaning _________________________________ (5) The two girls, walking home _________________________________ floor desk 62 It is _______ (rainy, sunny) today. Cathy and her parents are in the _______ (park, zoo). They are _______ (walking, running) on the path. One child is playing on the _______ (slide, swing). Two children are _______ (playing on the seesaw, kicking shuttlecocks). A boy and his father are flying a _______ (kite, plane). A bird is _______ (dancing, singing) in the tree. What a nice day! 2. Listen to the story. Check the missing word in the ( ). Then write it on the line. 63 The little pigs and the wolf, Is a story I love to read. The three little pigs, Are funny and smart. Let’s enjoy reading the story! 64 FUN READING THE THREE LITTLE PIGS 65 Mother Pig has three little pigs. They live in a big house on the farm. My children, it’s time for you to leave home. You need to build your own houses. Mother Pig tells the little pigs to leave home. 66 Whoosh! The straw house falls down. The wolf is angry. Little pig, little pig, open the door and let me in. No, I won’t. Then I’ll blow your house down. Here comes the wolf. I’m the first little pig. I live in the straw house. 67 Here comes the wolf. I’m the second little pig. I live in the wood house. No, I won’t. Little pig, little pig, open the door and let me in

metadata.source: 三年级下册英语清华版电子课本.pdf

chunks.content: . 66 Whoosh! The straw house falls down. The wolf is angry. Little pig, little pig, open the door and let me in. No, I won’t. Then I’ll blow your house down. Here comes the wolf. I’m the first little pig. I live in the straw house. 67 Here comes the wolf. I’m the second little pig. I live in the wood house. No, I won’t. Little pig, little pig, open the door and let me in. I’ll knock your house down. Crash! The wood house falls down. The wolf is angry. 68 The brick house does not fall. I’m the third little pig. I live in the brick house. No, I won’t. Little pig, little pig, open the door and let me in. Oh, no. This house is too strong! I’ll push your house down. Here comes the wolf. The wolf is angry. 69 The third little pig is stirring the soup in the pot. I’m so hungry. Let’s cook dinner. I’ll light the fire. I’ll get some wood. The three little pigs are all in the brick house now. I’m hungry, too. 70

chunks.content: ？ I cannot push the brick house down. What can I do? I’ve got a good idea. I’ll climb up on the roof and go down the chimney. The wolf thinks hard. The wolf sees a ladder. He is happy. 71 Look, the wolf is coming! What can we do? The wolf runs away as fast as he can. It’s so hot! Help! Help! The wolf is climbing up the ladder. The three little pigs are afraid. Splash! The wolf lands in the soup. Ha! Ha! Ha! That’s fun! as fast as 尽快地 (72) blow 吹 (67) brick 砖 (69) chimney 烟筒 (71) crash 哗啦 (68) down 向下 (67) f ire 火 (70) f irst 第一 (67) Ha! 哈 (72) knock 撞击，敲打 (68) ladder 梯子 (71) land 降落 (72) leave 离开 (66) light 点(火等) (70) own 自己的 (66) pot 锅 (70) push 推 (69) roof 屋顶 (71) second 第二 (68) splash 扑通 (72) stir 搅拌 (70) straw 稻草 (67) then 那么 (67) think 想，思考 (71) whoosh 嗖(象声词) (67) won ’ t 不愿意 (67) wood 木头 (68) 72 A again 再次 (28) ask 问 (15) B basket 篮，筐 (22) because 因为 (26) begin 开始 (28) blackboard 黑板 (58) C cannot = can not 不能，不可以 (24) card 卡，卡片 (36) carry 搬，提 (24) *Cheers! 干杯
